name: Ccv-multiplexer
tagline: Implementation of virtual camera multiplexing into CCV 1.5.
body:
This further adds scalability to the existing CCV. It allows running multiple instances of CCV on different computers over a network, and multiplex their data using a central server. [Blog](http://pratik9891.wordpress.com/) Originally hosted [here](http://code.google.com/p/ccv-multiplexer/) *** GSoC 2012 project
[![GSoC 2012](http://db.tt/ajna0re4)](http://www.google-melange.com/gsoc/homepage/google/gsoc2012)
**Students:** Pratik Sharma
**Mentors:** Amit Kumar Sarangi
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
